about_the_game:
WORLD OF ART - learn with JIGSAW PUZZLES
presents DLC:
MATURE 2: NUDITY ADULTS ONLY

Title says all, this DLC brings 36 tasteful, classical nudity paintings only for adult Players.
Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC is based on classical paintings including nudity. No sex, only nude paintings and tasteful nudity.
